name: Other World VR
description:
Other World is a short Vr Experience  where you take control of Psyrian, a great chamman chosen to slay an Elder Demon who is killing and plundering your people. Find clues to reach your goal by exploring this Magical Other World.

SEATED VR.


Minimum Requirements:

OS: Win 10 

Processor: Intel i7-4770 

Graphics:  NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 

System Memory: 16 GB RAM 

Storage: 2 GB Hard drive space
